solution_list.title: Nextcloud Hub
solution_list.description: Hub integrates the three key Nextcloud products Files, Talk and Groupware into a single platform, optimizing the flow of collaboration. Eliminate the confusing hodgepodge of different SaaS tools and the compliance, security, cost and productivity issues that come with it and standardize on a single solution with Nextcloud Hub.

reference_list.title: Centre de gestion informatique de l'éducation

success_case_list.title: Setup and operation of an on-premise Nextcloud cluster
success_case_list.description: Establishment of a data cloud as a GDPR-compliant platform for teachers in Luxembourg. In 2020, the CGIE launched a Nextcloud service to provide about 15000 teachers and staff members with a GDPR compliant file storage.
success_case_list.customer: Centre de gestion informatique de éducation

success_case_list.title: Nextcloud for 33K middle school students in France
success_case_list.description: SIB provides infrastructures to teachers and pupils: computers, servers, hosted applications, networks and support. To modernize their former file system with new requirements (remote access, multidevices compatibility, advanced collaboration features on documents, advanced sharing features and share groups) they chose Nextcloud

success_case_list.title: Germany’s public radio and television deploys Nextcloud
success_case_list.description: Extensive use of Nextcloud for easy transfer of multi-gigabyte sized audio/video files from remote locations to processing studios in Germany

success_case_list.title: Building a platform for efficient collaboration that is ready for the future
success_case_list.description: Project space for document exchange and collaboration with hundreds of external participants

success_case_list.title: Keeping data secure for a globally distributed organization working with politically sensitive data
success_case_list.description: Users at the Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung regularly uploaded files to public cloud services like Dropbox or Google Drive.  The social and politically sensitive work done by the Konrad-Adenauer-Stiftung created a strong motivation to look for a file sharing solution that IT could control. KAS started their own cloud project named ‘the KASCloud’ in 2015, building on ownCloud 7. In 2017, they decided to migrate to Nextcloud because of its capabilities to authenticate users against our LDAP directory in combination with the open source strategy.

success_case_list.title: tubCloud migration to Nextcloud 11
success_case_list.description: May 2017 the Technische Universität Berlin migrated from ownCloud 9.1 to Nextcloud 11, achieving over 38 % lower database load at peak times. This brought faster service for users as well as user interface improvements and better security. The migration was planned and executed in under 4 weeks without any problems and did not need the stand-by support from Nextcloud. This case study details the architecture and infrastructure at the TU Berlin, migration planning and execution as well as the results.

success_case_list.title: North-West University improves user storage mobility with Nextcloud and Collabora Online
success_case_list.description: North-West University improves user storage mobility with Nextcloud and Collabora Online

success_case_list.title: Deployment of Nextcloud and Collabora Online in middle schools.
success_case_list.description: Students work from home, inside Nextcloud Group Folders and use Collabora Online. This way teachers don’t have the issue that they don’t have the right Microsoft OŻce version to read the student's work, avoiding interoperability problems. Somewhere between 50 and 100 simultaneous users are currently active, during the height of the CoVid crisis this number was closer to 250 at any time.
